Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle; ‘De sancto Sixto Episcopo magistro Laurencii’
_description: ‘De sancto Sixto Episcopo magistro Laurencii’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: IN tyme of decius cesareþat used fals goddes and fendes lare…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat mede god grante vs man and chyldthurght praier of his moder mild
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De sancto Sixto Episcopo magistro Laurencii (rubric, f. 167va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 105-12.
